row.process:
:INC PCK.AUTOMIC_CLOUDFOUNDRY.PUB.INCLUDE.EXECUTION_ENVIRONMENT !------------------------------------------ LOGGING INPUT PARAMETERS ------------------------------------------ : INC PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.LOGGING.HEADER.PARAM_VALIDATION : SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "Cloud Foundry API URL" : SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER_VAL# = "&UC4RB_CF_API_ENDPOINT#" : INC PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.LOGGING.PARAM : SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "Username" : SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER_VAL# = "&UC4RB_CF_USERNAME#" : INC PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.LOGGING.PARAM : SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "Org" : SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER_VAL# = "&UC4RB_CF_ORGANIZATION#" : INC PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.LOGGING.PARAM : SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "Space" : SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER_VAL# = "&UC4RB_CF_SPACE#" : INC PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.LOGGING.PARAM : SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "Skip SSL Validation" : SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER_VAL# = "&UC4RB_CF_SSL_CHECK#" : INC PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.LOGGING.PARAM
:INC PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.LOGGING.HEADER.EXECUTION
!------------------------------------------ PREPARE AUTH DETAILS ---------------------------------------------- :SET &TEMP# = &UC4RB_CF_CONFIGFILE# !----------------Convert Slashses----------------------------------------- : SET &UC4RB_CF_CONFIGFILE# = STR_CAT(&UC4RB_CF_HOMEDIR#,&SEPARATOR#) : SET &UC4RB_CF_CONFIGFILE# = STR_CAT(&UC4RB_CF_CONFIGFILE#,"temp.json") : SET &UC4RB_CF_FILECONTENTS# = "{}" :INCLUDE PCK.AUTOMIC_CLOUDFOUNDRY.PUB.INCLUDE.CREATE_FILE : SET &UC4RB_CF_CONFIGFILE# = &TEMP#
:IF &UC4RB_CF_RETCODE# = 0 ! -------------------------------------Building input parameters----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- : INC PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.ATTACH ! DECRYPT PASSWORD : SET &UC4RB_ENCRYPTED_PASSWORD_TMP# = "&UC4RB_CF_PASSWORD#" : INC PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.DECRYPT_PASSWORD
: SET &UC4RB_CF_LOGIN_CLA# ="cf login"
! API ENDPOINT : INC PCK.AUTOMIC_CLOUDFOUNDRY.PUB.INCLUDE.ESCAPE_ARG_VALUE UC4RB_ESCAPED_STRING = UC4RB_CF_API_ENDPOINT : SET &UC4RB_CF_LOGIN_CLA# = STR_CAT(&UC4RB_CF_LOGIN_CLA#, " -a &UC4RB_CF_API_ENDPOINT#")
! username : INC PCK.AUTOMIC_CLOUDFOUNDRY.PUB.INCLUDE.ESCAPE_ARG_VALUE UC4RB_ESCAPED_STRING = UC4RB_CF_USERNAME : SET &UC4RB_CF_LOGIN_CLA# = STR_CAT( &UC4RB_CF_LOGIN_CLA#, " -u &UC4RB_CF_USERNAME#")
! organization : INC PCK.AUTOMIC_CLOUDFOUNDRY.PUB.INCLUDE.ESCAPE_ARG_VALUE UC4RB_ESCAPED_STRING = UC4RB_CF_ORGANIZATION : SET &UC4RB_CF_LOGIN_CLA# = STR_CAT( &UC4RB_CF_LOGIN_CLA#, " -o &UC4RB_CF_ORGANIZATION#")
! space : INC PCK.AUTOMIC_CLOUDFOUNDRY.PUB.INCLUDE.ESCAPE_ARG_VALUE UC4RB_ESCAPED_STRING = UC4RB_CF_SPACE : SET &UC4RB_CF_LOGIN_CLA# = STR_CAT( &UC4RB_CF_LOGIN_CLA# ," -s &UC4RB_CF_SPACE#")
! SSL Validation : IF &UC4RB_CF_SSL_CHECK# = "YES" : SET &UC4RB_CF_LOGIN_CLA# = STR_CAT( &UC4RB_CF_LOGIN_CLA# ," --skip-ssl-validation") : ENDIF
! LOGGING CF COMMAND : PRINT "EXECUTING CF LOGIN COMMAND: &UC4RB_CF_LOGIN_CLA#" : SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_INFO# = STR_CAT( "EXECUTING CF LOGIN COMMAND: ", &UC4RB_CF_LOGIN_CLA#) : INC PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.LOGGING.INFO
! Appending password with Login CF command as per the OS : SWITCH &$PLATFORM# : CASE "WINDOWS" : SET &UC4RB_CF_LOGIN_CLA# = STR_CAT( &UC4RB_CF_LOGIN_CLA#, " -p %UC4_DECRYPTED_PWD%") : CASE "UNIX" : SET &UC4RB_CF_LOGIN_CLA# = STR_CAT( &UC4RB_CF_LOGIN_CLA#, " -p $UC4_DECRYPTED_PWD") : OTHER : ENDSWITCH ! ------------------------------------------ INVOKING CF COMMAND LINE ------------------------------------------ &UC4RB_CF_LOGIN_CLA# :ENDIF
!Status messages :SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_INFO# = "******** LOGIN ACTION EXECUTED SUCCESSFULLY ********" :SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_ERROR# = "******** LOGIN ACTION FAILED ********"
!------------------------------------------ ERROR HANDLING ---------------------------------------------------- : INC PCK.AUTOMIC_CLOUDFOUNDRY.PUB.INCLUDE.CHECK_JOBSTATUS

row.post_process: !------------------------------------------ UPDATE AUTH INFO INTO VARA OBJECT ------------------------------------------ : SET &STATUS# = GET_UC_OBJECT_STATUS(,,"RETCODE") : SET &UC4RB_CF_AUTHTOKEN# = &$RUNID# : IF &STATUS# EQ 0 : INC PCK.AUTOMIC_CLOUDFOUNDRY.PUB.INCLUDE.UPDATE_AUTHINFO : PUBLISH &UC4RB_CF_AUTHTOKEN#,,"TOP" : ELSE : PSET &UC4RB_CF_AUTHTOKEN# = "" : ENDIF
